recommended_treatment: Carboplatin and paclitaxel chemotherapy with pelvic external beam radiation therapy and vaginal brachytherapy
description: High-grade uterine serous carcinoma measuring 3 cm with >50% myometrial invasion, extensive lymphovascular invasion, and metastatic involvement of pelvic and para-aortic lymph nodes (FIGO IIIC2, pT3a N2).
patient_notes: This report shows a high-grade serous cancer of the uterus that has invaded deep into the uterine muscle and spread to nearby lymph nodes (Stage IIIC2). The tumor measures 3 cm and there is evidence of lymphovascular invasion. Based on these findings, additional treatment such as chemotherapy and possibly radiation therapy will be recommended. Your care team will develop a personalized treatment plan and discuss the next steps with you.

verification.assessment: The extracted staging and pathology details are accurate. The only discrepancy is the omission of a guideline-based adjuvant treatment recommendation for FIGO IIIC2 uterine serous carcinoma.

recommended_treatment.issues: Field unspecified; NCCN guidelines specify adjuvant therapy for Stage IIIC2 uterine serous carcinoma.

change_explanations.recommended_treatment: Changed from 'Not specified' to 'Carboplatin and paclitaxel chemotherapy with pelvic external beam radiation therapy and vaginal brachytherapy'. Reason: Field unspecified; NCCN guidelines specify adjuvant therapy for Stage IIIC2 uterine serous carcinoma.
